items.text: To the chief Musician upon Gittith, A Psalm of David.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician upon Gittith, A Psalm of David.

items.text: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.
items.plainText: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.

items.text: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
items.plainText: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.

items.text: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;
items.plainText: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

items.text: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?
items.plainText: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?

items.text: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
items.plainText: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.

items.text: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:
items.plainText: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:

items.text: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
items.plainText: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;

items.text: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.
items.plainText: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.

items.text: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
items.plainText: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
